amendment.description: To modify contracts for the transportation of mail by air, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2753 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2753 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S926-927; text: CR S927) To modify contracts for the transportation of mail by air, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2753 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2753 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
